name: When (TATIYA (MINTO), Doggo, TeeLaser, NatchaphonDev)
description:
Neo, a girl who is not that master at communicating.  She's also  not good at making a conversation, or even conveying her own feelings, which leads her to have some arguments with her beloved brother, and a tragedy.

"I wish I could turn back the time. "

"Then just become master of the time!"

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Instructions:

Your goal is to finish all the quests in each stage to increase your time traveling power. Be careful, everything you do will affect your future!

Use A/D to walk, space to jump, E to interact

_______________________________________________________________________________________

This is the Demo version.

"When" is in development and will release more features in the future, so please stay tuned! 

For more information, please visit our website
